articles.title: Alexander-Arnold called 'major weakness' as Liverpool legend suggests Inter could overturn deficit - TEAMtalk
articles.description: Trent Alexander-Arnold has been called the 'weakest link' in the Liverpool side, with a Reds legend suggesting Inter can mount a Champions League recovery.
